schema.description: 版本类型，取值有： FOTA 系统版本， APP 应用版本

消息类型，取值：

-  **SYSTEM_UPDATE**：系统版本发布消息推送,
-  **APP_VERSION_UPDATE**：应用自升级发布消息推送

MessageSendRecordList.description: 查询到的消息发送记录

MessageType.description:
消息类型，取值：
 
- **SYSTEM_UPDATE**：系统版本发布消息推送
-  **APP_VERSION_UPDATE**：应用自升级发布消息推送

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "6F25F67C-F411-499F-BCE2-67CA563CB064",
  "MessageSendRecordList": {
    "TotalCount": 30,
    "Items": [
      {
        "GmtCreateTimestamp": 1645460000,
        "MessageType": "SYSTEM_UPDATE",
        "FailedCount": "0",
        "SkippedCount": "0",
        "Result": "SUCCESS",
        "SucceededCount": "100",
        "GmtCreate": "2018-01-01 00:00:00",
        "VersionId": "1",
        "ResultDesc": "发送成功",
        "TargetId": "1",
        "Id": 1
      }
    ]
  }
}","errorExample":"{
  "RequestId": "6F25F67C-F411-499F-BCE2-67CA563CB064",
  "HostId": "iovcc.cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com",
  "Code": "NoPermission.NotOwner",
  "Message": "You have no permission because you are not the owner of the data"
}"},{"type":"xml","example":"<FindVersionMessageSendRecordsResponse>
	<RequestId>6F25F67C-F411-499F-BCE2-67CA563CB064</RequestId>
	<MessageSendRecordList>
		<TotalCount>30</TotalCount>
		<Items>
			<Id>1</Id>
			<MessageType>SYSTEM_UPDATE</MessageType>
			<VersionId>1</VersionId>
			<TargetId>1</TargetId>
			<Result>SUCCESS</Result>
			<ResultDesc>发送成功</ResultDesc>
			<SucceededCount>100</SucceededCount>
			<FailedCount>0</FailedCount>
			<SkippedCount>0</SkippedCount>
			<GmtCreate>2018-01-01 00:00:00</GmtCreate>
		</Items>
	</MessageSendRecordList>
</FindVersionMessageSendRecordsResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询群发消息记录
summary: 查询版本下的群发消息记录，只针对按照机型群发的消息记录的查询。
